name: Charitas
description: Charitas is a community-driven protocol that is revolutionizing the way we fund charities. Our native token is built with simple tokenomics: static rewards, charity donations, automatic LP, and token burns. Investing in Charitas allows holders to govern our upcoming donation platform. Charitas is designed with real-world purpose to ensure the longevity and growth of the protocol. In development: Charitas Voting Application, NFT Marketplace, Charitas Foundation and Charitas Launchpad.
